- There's something
about this chocolate that
- I'm going to guess this is from --

- Oh, that's such another
satisfying little snapped.

- That just hit like a
whole 'nother dimension.
- When I bite into it I envision --

- With the birds kind of flying
around, and they're like --
- Argh, you're playing mind games with me.
- Oh my gosh! Wait, this is a good one.

- 'Cause this one has,

- This makes me think of, like --

you could taste the

- Word, this thing is gold, son!

- The place is hot, the place is swampy.
- Oh, I was going to say Vietnam!
- I'm so pissed I didn't say Vietnam.

I'm just thinking with
my gut, or my palate,
if you will, next time around.
- That's like chocolate and bubble gum,
like if they had a beautiful child.

- (beep) I've got to book
a flight to New Zealand.
is the pineapple New Zealand one.

- The Venezuelan one was
definitely my favorite.
- I'm still eating it right now.

- I think chocolate seems
to be a universal language

- Chocolate's the best, no
matter where it comes from.

keep doing what you're
doing and make chocolate.

title: People Try Chocolates From Around The World
